item.title: About Cloudprober
item.description: Posted on Sep 05, 2023 by Manu Garg ‐ 3 min read Origin # I started working on Cloudprober in 2016. I was leading the Cloud Networking SRE team at Google at that time. As Google Cloud started to grow big time, we started running into observability issues all over. Customers were finding problems before us, resulting in a lot of time being spent in troubleshooting and communicating back and forth1. Problem was that Google’s existing observability tools didn’t work for the external Cloud.
